headline: Is Atmos Energy’s EPS Streak, Dividend Hike and Infrastructure Plan Altering The Investment Case For Atmos (ATO)?
summary: In late 2025, Atmos Energy reported fiscal 2025 earnings per diluted share of US$7.46, its 23rd consecutive year of EPS growth, alongside a nearly 15% dividend increase to US$1.00 per quarter and upbeat fiscal 2026 guidance supported by a US$24.00 billion infrastructure investment plan through 2029. At the same time, the company moved to refine its governance and capital structure with proposed bylaw and charter changes, including more authorized common shares, updated voting rules in...
